channel.title: NPC's talking?
channel.description: How do i get NPC's to say things? Example, if i spawn a "hans" how do i get him to say "Pk Reward Items here!" I want to know how to go them to say things when you talk to them, like right click trade or talk. Also, how to get them to say it up above there heads. Thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2009, 12:18:41 am[/size][hr]Also, how do i add NPC's that trade things. How do i pick what they trade? Thanks.

item.title: NPC's talking?
item.dc:creator: @studsparky studsparky
item.description:
@studsparky wrote:

How do i get NPC’s to say things? Example, if i spawn a “hans” how do i get him to say “Pk Reward Items here!”
I want to know how to go them to say things when you talk to them, like right click trade or talk. Also, how to get them to say it up above there heads. Thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2009, 12:18:41 am[/size][hr]Also, how do i add NPC’s that trade things. How do i pick what they trade? Thanks.
